properties.name: label
properties.label: Label
properties.description: The label for assistive devices to announce. If unspecified, the value will be used instead.
properties.defaultValue: Scan this code to visit ServiceNow on the web!

uiBuilder.label: QR Code (Shoelace)

uiBuilder.label: Button (Shoelace)
uiBuilder.description: Buttons represent actions that are available to the user.

actions.name: SNC_CMP_RDE#SHOELACE_BUTTON_FOCUS
